interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Spanature Green Tea Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz
Review Date: 2021/05/30
Store: Spanature
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Spanature', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Green tea', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 2.1 x 1.9 inches; 8.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: This bundle includes 4 travel sized hand lotions that come individually gift boxed. This is convenient for adding to gift baskets or as stocking stuffers. I like the generous size of each tube of lotion. The lotion is moisturizing, but not too greasy. This is a high quality lotion that actually softens hands and combats dryness. I like the pleasant scent of this Green Tea hand lotion. The scent is light and fresh, but not too sweet nor strong.
Review Title: High quality hand lotion that smells good and comes packaged for gifting.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 6 Fluid Ounce
Mountain Falls
["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The salon quality formula softens cuticles and contains Vitamin E. Our formula is free of Parabens and Phthalates. Try Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover today."]
{'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Weight': '0.4 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'}
This nail polish remover works very well. It quickly and completely removes nail polish from fingernails and toenails. It’s nice that they included vitamin E and panthenol in the formula. However, I always wash my hands and feet after using nail polish remover, so I don’t think the added panthenol and vitamin E stay on long enough to provide any significant benefits. This product works well enough to deserve 5 stars, but I detracted a star because of the retail cost. There are more affordable nail polish removers that work just as well as this does. The additions of panthenol and vitamin E do not justify the high retail price.
Works quickly and effectively, but is overpriced.
Revitalizing N.M.F Intensive Hydrating Serum that treats Dull, Tired, Dry and Sensitive Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare
Manilla Natural Skincare
{'Skin Type': 'mature', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Brand': 'Manilla Natural Skincare', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Hydrating,Wrinkles', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
This serum comes in a thick glass bottle and a convenient dropper that makes it easy to apply. The color looks cloudy so I shake it up before each use. It has a thin and watery gel-like texture that is easy to spread evenly over my face. It absorbs quickly into my skin and does not feel sticky nor uncomfortable. It has a sweet scent that is not overpowering. This serum makes my skin looking and feeling smoother than before.
Absorbs quickly and improves the look and feel of skin’s surface.
Dr. Au Anti-Aging Face Oil Retinol Serum by Au Natural Skinfood - Promotes Youthful, Glowing Skin | Collagen Boosting Wrinkle Repair | No Oily Residue - Just Soft to the Touch Skin | Day & Night Moisturizing treatment for Men and Women
AÚ NATURAL SKINFOOD
{'Brand': 'AÚ NATURAL SKINFOOD', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Item Volume': '4 Fluid Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '0.9 x 0.9 x 3.8 inches; 1.59 Ounces'}
This face oil makes my skin feel smooth and soft. It applies easily and does not feel too heavy nor greasy. This softens the appearance of the lines on my forehead and around my mouth, making them less pronounced. This has a very light and pleasant scent.
Hydrating face oil for soft and smooth skin.
FRESHME Mud Mask - Facial Mask Kaolinite Clay Masks Cleansing and Moisturizing Brightening Smoothing Face Mask, 3.4 fl oz
FRESHME
{'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 1.89 x 1.85 inches; 4.9 Ounces'}
This is unlike any clay mask that I have ever used before. This product is water based and does not dry on my skin like most clay masks do. After I apply this to my face and leave it on for about 15 minutes, it still feels moist and slick when I go to rinse it off. The texture of this mask is more gel-like than it is clay. It feels lightweight and does not leave my skin feeling too dry and tight. This mask is effective enough for use during the winter, when my skin tends to be more dry. The product packaging looks attractive, but I wonder if they intentionally misspelled the word “moisturizing” as “moistorizing”.
Water based mask that does not dry on skin.
EASYDEW Starter Moist Whip Foam 5.07 fl oz - Non-Drying, Gentle & Purifying Foaming Cleanser with Ceramide I Exfoliating Daily Face Wash that Removes Dirts and Makeup
EASYDEW
{'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily to combination skin, Normal to dry skin, Sensitive to acne-prone skin', 'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Scent': 'Light floral', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '2.28 x 1.81 x 7.01 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmax'}
This is one of my favorite facial cleansers. I love how this lathers into a rich and creamy foam. This does an excellent job of cleaning my skin. It completely removes makeup, including mascara. This cleanser leaves my skin looking clean and feeling soft and smooth.
Luxuriously creamy lather that cleans and removes makeup.
Balance White Mud Balancing Mask by Au Natural Skinfood | Rotorua Exfoliating Mask with 16+ Manuka Honey | Certified | Food For Your Skin | All Skin Types | Made in New Zealand | 1.7 oz
AÚ NATURAL SKINFOOD
{'Brand': 'AÚ NATURAL SKINFOOD', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliates,Hydrates,Exfoliating', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '9.65 x 6.1 x 1.77 inches; 1.7 Ounces'}
Despite the high price for such a small amount of product you get, this mud mask really does work wonders for my skin. This mask is easy to apply. After spreading this over my entire face, I leave it on for 30 minutes before wiping it off with a wet washcloth. This mask leaves my skin feeling baby soft.
Expensive, but effectively softens skin.
Huxley Secret of Sahara Clay Mask Balanced Blend 4.23 fl. oz. | Korean Clay Mask to Refine Pores and Absorb Excess Oil and Sebum | Made with Moroccan Rhassoul Clay
Huxley
{'Brand': 'Huxley', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Special Feature': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '4.23 Fl Oz', 'Product Dimensions': '2.68 x 2.68 x 6.97 inches; 6.38 Ounces'}
This clay mask is nice because it is sheer enough so that it doesn’t harden and become too stiff and uncomfortable. It is lightly scented with a clean fragrance that smells pleasant when applying this to my face. The directions state to leave on for 5-10 minutes, and then to rinse it off before it is completely dry. I have noticed that if I do leave this mask on long enough for it to completely dry, it develops an unpleasant scent that smells like sulfur  when I go to remove it.
Works best when removed before it completely dries.
ILOJE Capsule CC Cream Comfortable Care SPF48 PA++ 1 pack
ILOJE
{'Brand': 'ILOJE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.01 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.89 x 0.98 x 4.53 inches; 1.69 Ounces'}
I use this CC cream as my foundation makeup on days when I want to quickly and effortlessly enhance my complexion and blur imperfections. It dispenses from the tube as a gray color, but the formula contains encapsulated pigments that change color on contact with skin. After applying this to my face, the cream takes on a beige shade that blends well with my skin tone. At first, I thought it would be too orange for my fair skin, but the color really does adjust itself. This CC cream provides light coverage. I use a moisturizer under this because it does make my face feel a little dry.
Blends to match medium to fair skin tones.
Real Hair Extensions Clip in Human Hair 18'' Clip in Hair Extensions for Women 7pcs Ombre Hair Extensions Human Hair 120g Remy Hair Extensions(4/27)
PLADIO
{'Brand': 'PLADIO', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.84 x 1.54 inches; 7.37 Ounces'}
These hair extensions are lightweight and comfortable enough to wear for an entire day. I have brown hair with blonde highlights. I ordered these in the Ombré Chocolate Brown to Caramel Blonde color. This color matches my hair perfectly. These extensions make my hair look fuller and longer. I like how realistic and natural these look.
Lightweight, comfortable, and doesn’t look fake.
Spanature Green Tea Hand & Body Lotion Travel Size Selection, 4 Pack, Revitalizing Moisturizer for Rough and Dry Skin, Nourishing and Gentle for All Skin Types, Made In Korea - 75 ml/2.53oz
Spanature

This bundle includes 4 travel sized hand lotions that come individually gift boxed. This is convenient for adding to gift baskets or as stocking stuffers. I like the generous size of each tube of lotion. The lotion is moisturizing, but not too greasy. This is a high quality lotion that actually softens hands and combats dryness. I like the pleasant scent of this Green Tea hand lotion. The scent is light and fresh, but not too sweet nor strong.
High quality hand lotion that smells good and comes packaged for gifting.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Effectiveness:** The user prioritizes efficient solutions in skincare and haircare, continuing to express satisfaction with products that deliver tangible results. Their recent purchase of a hand lotion reflects an appreciation for effective moisturizers that combat dryness without greasiness.

- **Ingredient & Material Awareness:** The user's focus on quality is evident across their beauty products, favoring items with natural ingredients. They value authenticity and reliability, as demonstrated by their interest in products that contribute positively to their skincare routine.

- **Cost Sensitivity:** Price consciousness is a significant aspect of their purchasing behavior, showing a keen evaluation of value versus effectiveness. The user is willing to invest in high-quality items that enhance their appearance, indicative of a balanced spending approach.

- **Quality vs. Price:** The user maintains a healthy balance between quality and cost, recognizing that higher-priced products can be justified when they meet performance and aesthetic expectations.

- **Routine-Oriented:** The user integrates products into established routines for convenience and efficacy. Their preferences highlight a seamless pairing of skincare and haircare items that enhance overall beauty without compromising efficiency.

Overall, the user continues to explore effective, high-quality beauty solutions across categories, emphasizing transparency, reliable performance, and the importance of authenticity in their selections, as seen in their recent skincare acquisition.
